CHAT.comment: Peter talked much more at this session than at Session02 producing over 300 different comprehensible utterances. He was still very much fascinated by the tape recorder and also spent much time playing with his blocks. At the end of the first session Father came home and there was some active play accompanied mostly by adult. Among the most frequent words occuring at this time were kaka (car) , more broken , house (playing with blocks) , turn it (watching the tape recorder) , turn around (watching tape recorder or spinning himself around) , open (RE: tape recorder) , fix , there , put on it , button (tape recorder) , close (tape recorder).
